subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton, who was out of shape for the preseason in Portland last season, showed up a week early to Knicks training camp, proud to be back on the team where he spent the best days of his career.
snippet: Raymond Felton, who was out of shape for the preseason in Portland last season, showed up a week early to Knicks training camp, proud to be back on the team where he spent the best days of his career.
